hey, Posting is boring. Cause I have nothing to say. School starts in exactly a week and not looking forward to it. ugh. 

bye.

wow, I'm updating. I forgot about livejournal. I am so bored and I was clicking on peopls links and one of them went to their livejournal. I was like well hey lets go on mine. Then I forgot my password and yeah. But I got it now. It's been forever since I posted, but I am now. School's out and it's summer, almost. I still have my bio regents on wednesday. oh I hope I pass. Tomorrow is actually the first day of summer so being that I'm not going to to post tomorrow I'll say it now.


HAPPY SUMMER!!!


Well I'm gonna go work on some biology. Might be back posting, eventually.

Haven't updated in like a million years. Wow. I guess I'm too into myspace. Well it's spring break. Not so fun. I have piles of homework and 10 stupid poems cause Mr. McCutcheon(my english teacher)loves guys. All these people are IMing me because there is some Matt kid on xanga and as his sn it's mine.. I have no idea why but everyone IM's me thinking it's him. It pisses me off sometimes. Well I'm gonna go work on bio homework and find something else to do for the night. Might post in the future.

Well, I haven't updated in a while. It's snowing and  we don't have school. =O) My dad just went out to get me bagels for breakfast. Yummy. Well I got to go call people to work for me on saturday from like 4 to 6:30.

Birthday- 9dayssss

I haven't even really been online alot cause I'm working and I really won't be online alot until like after christmas and stuff. well that's really all I had to say. I got new sneakers and they are tan. not black. go me. goodnight.

I thought I should update, I guess. Well yesterday was thanksgiving. I went to my grandma's in the morning got there about 9:30. Erin came up from the barn and had breakfast with me =oD. Then me my aunt and my fat sister brought her home. ummm we ate dinner at like 4 and dessert at like 6ishh then left. I was so tired yesterday.. I didn't want to come home but I had to because I have to wrk today at 1. It sucks. It's going to be sooooo busy cause it's black friday and people are stupid and go shopping on black friday when everyone else does. Why bother it's kind of stupd because you try to shop when it's not busy but then people still shop on black friday. I'm just mad because I have to work instead of going shopping with my cousin. Well today is alot Tim's birthday. Yesterday was my cousin Katie's. She was six. I didn't get to see her though. well that's it. Bye.

Tim suggested to update so I am because I can. Ha that just ryhmed. Nothing great is really happening. I got a job. It sucks already. The people are alright. Not that great. well I have to go to keyclub. I gotta go pee first so byee. I'll post tomorrow or sometime. 


HAPPY FOURTEENth BIRTHDAY MICHEL!!!!

hey, yesterday was pretty fun, expecially toward the end. lol I went to the great escape with Jess, Sabrina, and Becca. We went on the comet like 34985903457348 times in a row for some reasons ;0] lol there was this hot kid with a fro and oh man it was fun and bagger bagger bagger bagger, mushroom mushroom! bagger bagger bagger bagger SNAKKKEEEEE!!! lol Becca it's peanutbutter jelly time and HAMMER TIME! lol sabrina just singing random lyrics on the comet and sabrina won a hammer!! that makes a really weird sound and our funnel cake with extra sugar. And asking random kids for there sn's. and this chineese kid was saying hi to everyone on those ski lift things and becca was like wow he's hot so I was like hey!! my friend thinks your hot!! and this girl inn the chair thing behind his was like HE'S TAKEN!! and she had like ugly redish blondeish hair and was short and fat and scummy and I was gonna say I hope not by you but I'm too nice for that. :op and a chair thing on the boomerang just fell apart so we didn't go back on that. And I finally got to go on the nightmare. It wasn't that great though. um well yeah and I don't know what I'm doing today. I really need school stuff being that school starts in less than a week. I'm gonna try to atleast get one pair of shoes today and maybe a cpouple shirts or pants, not quite sure. But I'm just waiting around til my mom gets home from work or until she calls. alright I'm out I guess.. pzzzzz

omg jsut got back from wildwood NewJERSAY with my heatherr. it was wicked funnn I finally got her on the pink/purple/red rollercoaster and all those rides on the last night. the last night was about the best!! HEY BEAUTIFUL!!! oh man that guy was hot and so were only half the guys that were staring at me and heather lol some guy was like to me and heather.. you wanna make out with my friend? when we were in the ocean. and a radom guy came up and tickled heather because her shirt said tickles wanted. I don't like ghanster white people I mean it's just not right. it's like um look at what color your skin is dude! but our hats are soooo pretty and so are those guys' hair but they left I crieddd :'o[ oh yeah and I forgot about the roller coaster guy who told us to sit behind him and was asking us if we were cool. There's some freaky people up there but some are pretty hott :o* but that ladie oh good the HAyyyLff(sounds like she's couching up a hairball) price refills on drinks. lol and then we got the two guys who assumed me and heather were twins just because we had the same hat. Retards. who else... all the peverted guys that work in the stores along the boardwalk. there is more I just can't think right now I'm a bit tired. but omg it was sooo fun we got shorts that says I <3 you on the butt and stuff. well I'm gonna go talk to a few poeple and then go to bed I can't wait to sleep in my own bed although I'll miss Chrissy and heather :[

hey, wow I haven't posted in a long time. Well it's summer now and my computer hass been really gay so that's why I haven't been posting. I don't want it to be summer I wanted to stay at  liska kill *tears* :'0[ wow well this day totally sucks and it's only the 2nd actual day of being home bored this summer. yeah I graduated from 8th grade lst thursday and it was boring as hell, no awards for me. I came close to having to go to summer school for Spanish because even though I passed for the year I still failed the proficency by four points. but my mom said I didn't have to go and it wouldn't work out anyways so yay! even though I kinda wish I went because I am way bored here and being that I want to be in school, just not the high school :0[ succcckkkkkkkss. well and then um last friday night I had to sit through another graduation, for the high school [my sister] then we had her party on saturday and um I was sad because my cousin couldn't come because her house had a fire and she has to stay out of it for the whole summer, 2 months so it can be cleaned and also so the damage can be fixed. It really sucks. But heather came :0] I can't stay up there at my cousin's like me and her planned on me doing this summer so she might stay down here the whole next week but I'm really not sure. My mom was bitching at me because she told me not to make plans before I ask her but I really don't get it because no one would never get anywhere if they never mad the plans first. but I don;t get here because she doesn't make any sence anyways. and well I have to go um to Utica this weeknd for a forth of july type party. but umm yay I get my sister's cellphone next week when she's 18. God I can't wait. It's sooo much better than mine now. Mine has no clock on it and no caller ID and no vibrating thing, like the vibrating setting doesn't work. That sounds really bad but you know what I mean. So um my phone is like 5 years old and it's big and d a flip phone:0DDD well I think I'll go I wrote alot. oh yeah and by the way I have 4 husbands! Tim, Nate, Ray, and Steve<3. oh yeah and I got a new pretty mouse and it scrolls unlike my oother one because I broke the scroll when I got mad at my computer once.




Byeeeee!

Monday- school, lacrosse game at the highschool against Sand Creek. Then back here for food and sleep.
